parameters.name: Style
parameters.description: Style of balloon as defined in swBalloonStyle_e

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Balloon size as defined in swBalloonFit_e

parameters.name: UpperTextStyle
parameters.description: Balloon text style as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e

parameters.name: UpperText
parameters.description: Text for the balloon; valid only if UpperTextStyle is one of the following: swBalloonTextContent_e.swBalloonTextCustom swBalloonTextContent_e.swBalloonTextCustomProperties swBalloonTextContent_e.swBalloonTextCutListProperties

parameters.name: LowerTextStyle
parameters.description: Lower text style as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e ; valid only if Style is swBalloonStyle_e.swBS_SplitCirc

parameters.name: LowerText
parameters.description: Text for the lower text in the balloon; valid only if Style is swBalloonStyle_e.swBS_SplitCirc and LowerTextStyle is one of the following: swBalloonTextContent_e.swBalloonTextCustom swBalloonTextContent_e.swBalloonTextCustomProperties swBalloonTextContent_e.swBalloonTextCutListProperties

parameters.name: CustomSize
parameters.description: User-defined size of the balloon; valid only if Size is swBalloonFit_e.swBF_UserDef

parameters.name: ShowQuantity
parameters.description: True to show quantity, false to not

parameters.name: QuantityPlacement
parameters.description: Placement of quantity value as defined in swBalloonQuantityPlacement_e ; valid only if ShowQuantity is true

parameters.name: QuantityDenotationText
parameters.description: Denotation text for quantity; valid only if ShowQuantity is true

parameters.name: QuantityDistance
parameters.description: Distance between the balloon and the quantity; valid only if ShowQuantity is true

title: IModelDocExtension.EditBalloonProperties2
signature:
System.Object EditBalloonProperties2( 
   System.Int32
Style
,
   System.Int32
Size
,
   System.Int32
UpperTextStyle
,
   System.String
UpperText
,
   System.Int32
LowerTextStyle
,
   System.String
LowerText
,
   System.Double
CustomSize
,
   System.Boolean
ShowQuantity
,
   System.Int16
QuantityPlacement
,
   System.String
QuantityDenotationText
,
   System.Double
QuantityDistance
)

parameters.name: Style
parameters.description: Style of balloon as defined in swBalloonStyle_e

parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: Balloon size as defined in swBalloonFit_e

parameters.name: UpperTextStyle
parameters.description: Balloon text style as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e

parameters.name: UpperText
parameters.description: Text for the balloon; valid only if UpperTextStyle is one of the following: swBalloonTextContent_e.swBalloonTextCustom swBalloonTextContent_e.swBalloonTextCustomProperties swBalloonTextContent_e.swBalloonTextCutListProperties

parameters.name: LowerTextStyle
parameters.description: Lower text style as defined in swBalloonTextContent_e ; valid only if Style is swBalloonStyle_e.swBS_SplitCirc

parameters.name: LowerText
parameters.description: Text for the lower text in the balloon; valid only if Style is swBalloonStyle_e.swBS_SplitCirc and LowerTextStyle is one of the following: swBalloonTextContent_e.swBalloonTextCustom swBalloonTextContent_e.swBalloonTextCustomProperties swBalloonTextContent_e.swBalloonTextCutListProperties

parameters.name: CustomSize
parameters.description: User-defined size of the balloon; valid only if Size is swBalloonFit_e.swBF_UserDef

parameters.name: ShowQuantity
parameters.description: True to show quantity, false to not

parameters.name: QuantityPlacement
parameters.description: Placement of quantity value as defined in swBalloonQuantityPlacement_e ; valid only if ShowQuantity is true

parameters.name: QuantityDenotationText
parameters.description: Denotation text for quantity; valid only if ShowQuantity is true

parameters.name: QuantityDistance
parameters.description: Distance between the balloon and the quantity; valid only if ShowQuantity is true

remarks: Before calling this method, select the balloon annotation whose properties you want to edit.
